case_circumstances: The body of a badly decomposed male was found in the Detroit River just south of Belle Isle.
case_head_hair: Natural and approximately 2" in lenth, held in place by multiple toothpicks.
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is available and entered
case_clothing_on_body: Brown long-sleeved shirt, brown and white patterned double-shit pants, blue and white shorts
case_footwear: dark socks and black shoes with a high heel
case_jewelry: Metal banded Timex watch (time stopped Tuesday the 9th at 10:30) a gold-tone (costume jewelry) ring-with a pear shaped cluster of clear stones (several were missing) was worn on the right ring finger.
case_other_items_with_body: A metal lighter-Bic butane style, 4 wooden toothpics
dental: Dental information / charting is currently not available
documents: There are currently no documents available for this case.
